Fix Quality Degradation Detection.name: Fix Quality Level
Fix Quality Degradation Detection.description: GPS fix quality (1=No Fix, 2=2D, 3=3D, 4=DGPS, 5=RTK Float, 6=RTK Fixed)

Satellite Count Critical Threshold.name: Active Satellites
Satellite Count Critical Threshold.description: Number of satellites used in position solution

Satellite Count Drop Rate Detection.name: Satellite Drop Rate
Satellite Count Drop Rate Detection.description: Rate of satellite loss over 5-second window

Automatic Gain Control Monitoring.name: AGC Jamming Level
Automatic Gain Control Monitoring.description: AGC level indicating elevated noise floor

Checksum Failure Rate Monitoring.name: Checksum Failure Rate
Checksum Failure Rate Monitoring.description: Rate of NMEA/RTCM message checksum failures

Truncated Sentence Rate Monitoring.name: Truncated Message Rate
Truncated Sentence Rate Monitoring.description: Rate of incomplete GPS message reception

Rover Velocity Limit Monitoring.name: Velocity Check
Rover Velocity Limit Monitoring.description: GPS-reported velocity vs. expected rover limits

Carrier Phase Cycle Slip Detection.name: Cycle Slips
Carrier Phase Cycle Slip Detection.description: Carrier phase discontinuities on multiple satellites

GPS-INS Position Consistency Check.name: GPS-INS Position Diff
GPS-INS Position Consistency Check.description: Difference between GPS and INS position estimates

Time-of-Week Anomaly Detection.name: GPS Time Anomalies
Time-of-Week Anomaly Detection.description: GPS time jumps, backward time, or missing increments
